Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.Bullet

Packages that use Bullet
edu.rit.draw.item Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing. 
 

Uses of Bullet in edu.rit.draw.item
 

Fields in edu.rit.draw.item declared as Bullet
static Bullet Bullet.CIRCLE
          A bullet in the shape of a medium sized circle, offset the normal offset (36.0, or 1/2 inch) from the text item.
static Bullet Bullet.DOT
          A bullet in the shape of a medium sized dot, offset the normal offset (36.0, or 1/2 inch) from the text item.
static Bullet Bullet.NONE
          A nonexistent bullet.
static Bullet Text.NORMAL_BULLET
          The normal bullet (none).
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw.item that return Bullet
 Bullet Text.bullet()
          Returns this text item's bullet.
static Bullet Text.defaultBullet()
          Returns the default bullet.
 Bullet Bullet.offset(double theOffset)
          Set this bullet's offset.
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type Bullet
 Text Text.bullet(Bullet theBullet)
          Set this text item's bullet.
static void Text.defaultBullet(Bullet theBullet)
          Set the default bullet.
 

Constructors in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type Bullet
Bullet(Bullet theBullet)
          Construct a new bullet of the same kind as the given bullet, but with the default offset.
